definition: code of conduct/conventions/common practice/routine (medical procedure etc)
Standing Committee of the National People's Congress (abbr. of 全國人民代表大會常務委員會|全国人民代表大会常务委员会)
pinyin: Quan2 guo2 Ren2 Da4 Chang2 Wei3 hui4

sentences.english: Corneal ulcers occur most often in patients who use extended-wear soft contact lenses.
sentences.chinese: 角膜潰瘍最常發生於長期使用軟性角膜接觸鏡的病人。

sentences.english: Red edge position (REP, 680-780 nm) has been used for evaluating crop leaves nitrogen status.
sentences.chinese: 紅邊位置常被用於監測作物葉片氮素營養狀況。

sentences.english: The thickened septa are most often smooth, but septal nodules may sometimes be seen.
sentences.chinese: 增厚的小葉間隔常平滑，但有時可呈結節狀。

sentences.english: As the saying goes, the devil often appears in the subtle.
sentences.chinese: 俗話說，魔鬼常出現在細微處。

sentences.english: These antennas are commonly used at earth-based stations in satellite communications systems.
sentences.chinese: 這種螺旋天線常用於無形通訊系統中的地面臺站。

sentences.english: Babies tumble when they are learning to walk.
sentences.chinese: 幼兒在學走路時常常跌倒。

sentences.english: Heterocycle is always pyrimidine or triazine.
sentences.chinese: 其中雜環部分常爲嘧啶環或均三嗪環。

sentences.english: She was often heared humming this song.
sentences.chinese: 人們常聽見她哼這首歌。

sentences.english: Hope scars, realized that even with life, are often trapped.
sentences.chinese: 望滿身傷痕，才明白即使嬉笑一生，也常被困。

sentences.english: A doctor was having an affair with his nurse.
sentences.chinese: 有位醫生，常跟科室裏的女護士鬼混。

sentences.english: That is why they did not sell their land.
sentences.chinese: 他們喫法老所給的常俸，所以他們不賣自己的地。

sentences.english: My father always picks me up after school.
sentences.chinese: 我父親常開車順便接我。

sentences.english: Chicken soup is often thought to be a healthy dish (prepared by a family member) and (given to us) when we are sick.
sentences.chinese: 雞湯常被認爲是我們生病時，家人爲我們準備的補品。

sentences.english: Pies and tarts often contain berries as do many other pastries.
sentences.chinese: 派和餡餅常以漿果爲陷，而許多糕餅類亦然。

sentences.english: What kind of meat are you most popular in your country?
sentences.chinese: 在你們國家人們最常喫哪幾種肉？

sentences.english: We read books aloud a lot in our family.
sentences.chinese: 咱們的家人常大聲朗誦書。

definition: easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes
for the most part/many/most/the greater part/mostly
usually/in many cases/more often than not
